name: Siebel: Defining Ancestry of Custom Applets
description: Reports the Applets that do not have Upgrade Ancestor property or have it switched to off
output: This rule reports Applets not defining the Ancestry
rationale:
The Upgrade Ancestor property allows copied objects (of types Applet, Business Component, Report, and Integration Object) to inherit properties of the original objects from which they were copied. During an upgrade, changes applied to the original objects are also applied to copied objects.
Without this property set, new functionalities will not be added to the custom Applet.
remediation:
The Upgrade Ancestor property should be configured for custom objects that are clones of existing objects.
The best time to do this is immediately upon copying the object.
alternativeName: Siebel: Defining Ancestry of Custom Applets
